lines.text: let MAXN a constant long long with value 1e5 + 69
let INF a constant long long with value 1e9 + 85
let n and res long longs
let str a string array of length MAXN
DUMMY
read n
read the first n values of str
lines.code: for ( long long i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) cin >> str [ i ] ;

lines.text: for char i from a to z
lines.code: for ( char i = ' a ' ; i <= ' z ' ; i ++ )

lines.text: for char j from i + 1 to z
lines.code: for ( char j = i + 1 ; j <= ' z ' ; j ++ )

lines.text: let ans a long long with value 0
for long long it from 0 to n
lines.code: for ( long long it = 0 ; it < n ; it ++ )

lines.text: let active a long long with value 0
for long long jt from 0 to size of str [ it ]
lines.code: for ( long long jt = 0 ; jt < str [ it ] . size ( ) ; jt ++ )

lines.text: if str [ it ] [ jt ] is neither i nor j , set active to 1
lines.code: if ( str [ it ] [ jt ] != i and str [ it ] [ jt ] != j ) active = 1 ;

lines.text: if active is 0 , add size of str [ it ] to ans
lines.code: if ( active == 0 ) ans += str [ it ] . size ( ) ;

lines.text: DUMMY
set res to max of ans and res
DUMMY
print res
